scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Groups_GroupTitle_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($page = $core_v2_groupUrls.Current) #if ($page == 'Contact') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Contact')) #elseif ($page == 'AccessDenied') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Hubs_AccessDenied_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'RequestMembership') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Hubs_RequestMembership')) #elseif ($page == 'MemberList') #if ($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('UserID')) #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Hubs_EditMember')) #else #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Role_Members')) #end #elseif ($page == 'ContactRequests') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Hubs_ContactRequest')) #elseif ($page == 'MentionList') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Hubs_MentionList')) #elseif ($page == 'Tags') #set($title = $core_langauge.GetResource('TagBrowser_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Custom' && $core_v2_customPage.Current) #set($title = $core_v2_widget.ApplyTokens($core_v2_customPage.Current.Title)) #elseif ($page == 'leaders.grouplist') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Leaderboards')) #end #if ($page == 'Group') $core_v2_page.SetTitle('', true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$core_v2_group.Current.Name

#end #elseif ($title) $core_v2_page.SetTitle($title, true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$title

#end #else $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Groups_GroupTitle_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="visible" labelResourceName="Title_Visible" defaultValue="False" dataType="Bool" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="Contact">Contact</resource> <resource name="Groups_GroupTitle_Description">Displays the title for group pages.</resource> <resource name="Groups_GroupTitle_Name">Group - Title</resource> <resource name="Hubs_AccessDenied_Title">Access Denied</resource> <resource name="Hubs_ContactRequest">Contact Requests</resource> <resource name="Hubs_EditMember">Edit Member</resource> <resource name="Hubs_MentionList">Mentions</resource> <resource name="Hubs_RequestMembership">Request Membership</resource> <resource name="Leaderboards">Leaderboards</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="Role_Members">Members</resource> <resource name="Title_Visible">Show the title in the page</resource> </language>
